name: 喻沐英
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
First Semester: Fall 2010
Week
1. Introduction
2. Unit 1. A. The World of Advertising: Reading One, “Advertising All over the World”; B. Advertising on the Air: Listening One.
3. Unit 1. A. The World of Advertising: Reading Two, “Changing World Markets”; B. Advertising on the Air: Listening Two.
4. Review 1.
5. Unit 2. A. Fraud: Reading One, “Catch Me if You Can”; B. Identity Theft: Listening One.
6. Unit 2. A. Fraud: Reading Two, “The Michelle Brown Story”; B. Identity Theft: Listening Two.
7. Review 2.
8. Class midterm exam
9. Proficiency Test
10. Unit 3. A. Going to Extremes: Sports and Obsession: Reading One, “An Interview with Tony Hawk; B. Endurance Test: Listening One.
11. Unit 3. A. Going to Extremes: Sports and Obsession: Reading Two, “High School Star Hospitalized for Eating Disorder; B. Endurance Test: Listening Two.
12. Review 3.
13. Unit 4. A. Speaking of Gender: Reading One, “Different Ways of Talking”; B. Separated by the Same Language: Listening One.
14. Unit 4. A. Speaking of Gender: Reading Two, “Speaking of Gender: An Interview with a Professor of Communication”; B. Separated by the Same Language: Listening Two.
15. Review 4.
16. Unit 5. A. Ecotourism: Reading One, “Tourists in a Fragile Land”; B. Culture and Commerce: Listening One.
17. Class Final Exam
18. Proficiency Test
scorePolicy: Assessment for the course will comprise up to three demonstrations, as well as assignment and tests, which will be given at the instructor’s discretion. The grade will be a cumulative average of all demonstrations, in class assignments, homework, tests, and attendance.
materials:
A. Barton, Laurie and Carolyn Dupaquier Sardinas. North Star 3 :Reading and Writing. 3rd ed. White Plains: Pearson, 2009.
B. Solorzano, Helen S. and Jennifer P. L. Schmidt. North Star 3: Listening and Speaking. 3rd ed. White Plains: Pearson, 2009.
